title: catalog_reporting Lambda Output
description: The output for the catalog_reporting Lambda.

anotherPage.description: Indicates if more results can be retrieved on another page.

providerId.description: The unique ID of the provider. Provided by Cumulus.

collectionId.description: The unique ID of the collection. Provided by Cumulus.

id.description: The unique ID of the granule. Provided by Cumulus.

createdAt.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, data was originally ingested into cumulus.

executionId.description: Step function execution ID from AWS.

ingestDate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, that the data was originally ingested into ORCA.

lastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, that information was updated.

files.description: The files within the granule. Defaults to the latest stored version of each file.

name.description: The name and extension of the file.

cumulusArchiveLocation.description: Cumulus bucket the file resides in.

orcaArchiveLocation.description: Archive bucket the file resides in.

keyPath.description: S3 path to the file including the file name and extension, but not the bucket.

sizeBytes.description: Size in bytes of the file. From Cumulus ingest.

hash.description: Checksum hash of the file provided by Cumulus.

hashType.description: Hash type used to calculate the hash value of the file.

storageClass.description: The class of storage containing the file.

version.description: AWS provided version of the file.
